problem_text_cn: 如图,一块三角尺ABC的斜边AB与量角器的直径恰好重合,点D对应的刻度是46°,则∠ACD的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the hypotenuse AB of a triangle ABC coincides with the diameter of the protractor, and the scale corresponding to point D is N_0, then the degree of ∠ACD is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接OD,∵直角三角板ABC的斜边AB与量角器的直径恰好重合,∴点A,B,C,D共圆,∵点D对应的刻度是46°,∴∠BOD=46°,∴∠BCD=\frac{1}{2}∠BOD=23°,∴∠ACD=90°-∠BCD=67°．故选:D．
